title: Vendor
description: The commercial entity from which the library orders and receives materials.

id.description: Unique ID for order item generated by the system but not currently displayed in the user interface.

name.description: The name provided by the commercial entity from which the library orders and receives materials.

accountancySystemId.description: Unique ID used by the accountancy system or external financial system for the vendor.

gstRegistrationNumber.description: A unique, 15-digit identification number issued to a business registered under the Goods and Services Tax (GST) on the basis of the PAN number of the business. The last digit is a checksum number.

pstRegistrationNumber.description: A unique, 11-character identification number (e.g., PST-1234-5678) issued to a business registered under the Provincial Sales Tax (PST).
